means: 巴力（古代迦南人信奉的司生生化育之神），邪神，偶像
Black Academy of Arts and Letters 布莱克文学艺术学院

sentence.Network_en: Although the heroes defeat Baal, his demonic army continues to advance.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然Baal被打败, 但他的军团仍然继续在杀戮.

sentence.Network_en: Baal and his army march on Mount Arreat.
The resulting explosion destroys Mount Arreat, ravages much of the countryside , and decimates Baal's army.
sentence.Network_cn: 所导致的爆炸摧毁了Arreat山, 冲击横扫这个城市,同时也扫平了Baal的军队.

PerfectNetExp.abs: [疑问]慧音与巴力(Baal)有没有什么关系?只看楼主收藏回复 von7dorf  我知道慧音有一半的白泽血统;但是,白泽和Baal神会不会是有关联的东西?总之按两河.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous local fertility and nature deities worshipped by ancient Semitic peoples; the Hebrews considered Baal a false god

auth_sentence.content: On that basis, faith in the Christian God is no less occult than faith in Shiva, Baal, Thor or witchcraft.
